issue.title: Error in new catkin workspace setup

content.raw:
Hi @{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} , thanks for the answer. Fortunately, I still can use Docker image to simulate the map and the robot. I just try to rebuild the catkin workspace because in the tutorial, there is a section called “Artifacts validation tool". That section is used with the catkin workspace so I just try to use it. If there is any way allow me to use “Artifacts validation tool" in Docker image \(I used option 1 for Docker <= 19.03\), please let me know.

Hi @{557058:14b7fd50-d65a-47a8-825c-fa89681d07bd} , thanks for asking. I have installed a clean Ubuntu 18.04 on my computer recently.
content.html:
Hi @Alfredo Bencomo , thanks for the answer. Fortunately, I still can use Docker image to simulate the map and the robot. I just try to rebuild the catkin workspace because in the tutorial, there is a section called “Artifacts validation tool". That section is used with the catkin workspace so I just try to use it. If there is any way allow me to use “Artifacts validation tool" in Docker image (I used option 1 for Docker <= 19.03), please let me know.

Hi @Arthur Schang , thanks for asking. I have installed a clean Ubuntu 18.04 on my computer recently.
